attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: bruh ur really gonna take space up on the app store with this???? waste of my time 🙄 i was trying to track trump’s location and it didn’t show up. how am i supposed to give him covid if i can’t meet up with him ugh. definitely don’t download this piece of trash. i’d rather spend my time donating to the biden campaign or something 👀

attributes.title: The app is bad
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded it has tons of bugs and always crashes my phone.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: When I first opened the app I saw a very ugly mans face it scared me so bad. It almost gave me a heart attack🤢. This app took FOREVER to download and it’s full of spam☹️Definitely deserves a zero star rating😝

attributes.title: Don’t do it!
attributes.review: Worst app ever!! It took all the data from my phone and sold it to other companies! I think even some company from China!! Don’t risk it!!

attributes.title: Terribleness
attributes.review: I saw a dusty hot Cheeto on the cover and it made me puke get this out and I think it was part chimpanzee and a cockroach he is scary get him out 1 star for sure(he doesn’t get to be president 😤)

attributes.title: Tiktok
attributes.review: This app is so bad it messes up my phone and i had to get a new one cuz the server broke down and burned my phone dont get this unlesss ur gonna buy a new phone:)

attributes.title: Bad this is sad
attributes.review: This app did not do what I was suppose to do trump said he will America great he made it worst. It was better with out him. Obama was a great president why can’t we have him back. BLM

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: It wouldn’t let me open it and it lagged a lot. When it would I felt attacked by a man who has no respect for women and shouldn’t be president. This app is the absolute worst.

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.userName: i got that boom boom pow
attributes.review: i got the app to see what the hype for it was, but when i tried to launch it it crashed my whole phone. my phone crashed, and the app even cracked my screen. my eyes were bleeding of the sight of that orange dude. the app was terrible and i hated it. i was in favor of having trump as my president, but now because of this app i’m switching parties.

attributes.title: Not Very Good
attributes.review: Opening this app I saw a weird looking orange man, it scared me 😣 As soon as I put in my information the app started to malfunction. Many bugs, I advise ✨taking down this app✨
